name: Konka_Smart
0:
”Alexa,open Konka Smart.”
”Alexa,ask Konka Smart turn on air cleaner.”
”Alexa,ask Konka Smart turn off light.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: konka smart
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Before you can connect Alexa with Konka Smart devices ,you need to follow there steps:
1.Download "kilink" app from Konka's official site.
2.Sign up or sign in with your konka's user account.
3.Search and add your devices from app.Make sure you can control them in the app.
4.Open Alexa app,search "konka smart" skill and enable it by signing in with the account you used in "kilink" app.
